{{cpp/text/text_encoding/title|environment_is}}
{{cpp/text/text_encoding/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++26|
template&lt; id I &gt;
static bool environment_is();
}}

Checks whether the {{rlp|environment|environment encoding}} is equal to the encoding whose MIBenum value is the specified value {{c|I}}. A call to this function is equivalent to {{c|1=return environment() == I;}}.

This function is deleted unless the {{c|CHAR_BIT}} is {{c|8}}.

===Template parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|I|a {{tt|text_encoding::id}} whose value to compare}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|true}} if {{c|environment()}} is equal to {{c|I}}; {{c|false}} otherwise.
